title: This Surface, at this Instant, Exists within an Environment Where an Act of Social Intercourse Very Similar to an Indeterminate Number of Others Since Forgotten Will Occur Once Again
credits: Partial gift of the Daled Collection and partial purchase through the generosity of Maja Oeri and Hans Bodenmann, Sue and Edgar Wachenheim III, Agnes Gund, Marlene Hess and James D. Zirin, Marie-Josée and Henry R. Kravis, and Jerry I. Speyer and Katherine G. Farley
